VB_HeardSinging.synopsis: Players comment on hearing a human voice singing as they enter a goblin camp.

VB_HeardSinging_0.speaker: Player
VB_HeardSinging_0.context: NodeContext: hearing a voice singing in the distance... slightly incredulous

VB_HeardSinging_1.speaker: Player
VB_HeardSinging_1.text: Sounds like they've captured themselves a bard...
